verses.verse: יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD אֱלֹהַי֙ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hai thou [art] my God אַתָּ֔ה <WH859> 'at-Tah, you אֲרֽוֹמִמְךָ֙ <WH7426> a-ro-mi-Cha exalt אוֹדֶ֣ה <WH3034> o-Deh thee I will praise שִׁמְךָ֔ <WH8034> shim-Cha, thy name כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for עָשִׂ֖יתָ <WH6213> 'a-Si-ta for thou hast done פֶּ֑לֶא <WH6382> Pe-le; wonderful עֵצ֥וֹת <WH6098> e-Tzot [things thy] counsels מֵֽרָח֖וֹק <WH7350> me-ra-Chok of old אֱמ֥וּנָה <WH530> 'e-Mu-nah [are] faithfulness אֹֽמֶן׃ <WH544> 'O-men. [and] truth

וְאָמַר֙ <WH559> ve-'a-Mar And it shall be said בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> bai-Yom in that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu, he הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold אֱלֹהֵ֥ינוּ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu Lo this [is] our God זֶ֛ה <WH2088> zeh this קִוִּ֥ינוּ <WH6960> kiv-Vi-nu we have waited ל֖וֹ lo וְיֽוֹשִׁיעֵ֑נוּ <WH3467> ve-yo-shi-'E-nu; for him and he will save זֶ֤ה <WH2088> zeh This יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> Yah-weh God קִוִּ֣ינוּ <WH6960> kiv-Vi-nu we have waited ל֔וֹ lo, נָגִ֥ילָה <WH1523> na-Gi-lah for him we will be glad וְנִשְׂמְחָ֖ה <WH8055> ve-nis-me-Chah and rejoice בִּישׁוּעָתֽוֹ׃ <WH3444> bi-shu-'a-To. in his salvation
